value.title: Google's Fabricius uses machine learning to decode hieroglyphs
value.excerpt: Google’s Arts and Culture vertical has been known to release fun apps and tools to help people engage with art and history. Now, the company is launching a web-based AI tool to let users interact with ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs and also help researchers decode the symbols with machine learning.

value.title: Deep Learning AI Needs Tools To Adapt To Changes In The Data Environment

value.title: Translate Ancient Hieroglyphs With Google's New AI-Powered Tool
value.excerpt: Get started with a short course on the history of hieroglyphs, the writing system used by the ancient North African civilization. Try your hand at tracing, drawing and identifying different symbols, each of which is instantly compared to more than 800 unique glyphs using Google's machine learning platform Cloud Auto ML.
